name: places/ChIJzXHL-ZtZwokREbefsFeMjts
adrFormatAddress: 2 &, 750 3rd Ave #10, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
If you’ve received a letter from them, and you don’t know what this is about, hopefully you’ll be smart enough to google the company’s name and see the reviews before you react. That’s not what I did lol but I can help.

Called them to see what’s up and the person didn’t even know how to speak English. The red flag showed up. I said “I don’t have a vehicle so I don’t understand the letter?” And he replied “so… are you a homeowner?” Hahahah if the letter came as “2024 vehicle notification department” then why was he asking about my property? Ummm.. sus! What a sad world and age we’re living in. Scammers everywhere. I feel sorry for the unassisted elderly community or the naive at heart who falls for this. Rip the letter. Move on.

originalText.text: SCAM! THE WORST COMPANY EVER! RUN AWAY DONT EVEN LOOK THEOR WAY. THEY WILL JUST STEAL YOUR MONEY AND NEVER COVER ANY ISSUES THAT THEY PROMISE YOU AT SIGN UP. NO TIRES REPLACEMENT, NO TRANSMISSION NO OIL CHANGE, THEY ABSOLITELY DO NOTHING FOR YOU. SEEKING LEGAL HELP! MAING SURE THEY CANT CONTINUE TO SCAM US HARD WORKING CITIZENS.  ENDURANCE  BELONGS IN JAIL SHAME ON THEM

originalText.text: Got a letter in the mail from them saying they cant honor my service contract price and will be increasing it but I have never had any contract or service from them

text.text: Got a letter in the mail from them saying they cant honor my service contract price and will be increasing it but I have never had any contract or service from them

originalText.text: I’ve had this insurance for a year now and when I tell you they don’t cover not one thing it’s a shame . I’ve gone to the dealer on 3 separate occasion and not one time have they covered anything .. ITS THE WORST LET ME TELL YOU . I went to go fix my tires and they had a nerves to tell me that the piece needed to fix my tire which is on the tire is not covered . Really ?!?.. Horrible I say just horrible.. This company will offer you a car wash and then turn around and tell you have to pay additional for the soap and water ... This company deserve to be shut down for all of the false advertisements that they promote...I’m soo mad I had to come back and add more to this review ... The claims department is by far the worst WORST ...I wouldn’t recommend this company to a blind dog.. will be switching immediately after this month.
